name: Flutter Development Hooks
description: Automated hooks for Flutter app development workflow

action.prompt:
Scaffold a complete Flutter project structure for AuraSync photo sharing app. Create the following structure:

- lib/features/ with auth, join_event, gallery, upload, profile folders
- lib/core/ with services, theme, utils folders
- lib/widgets/ for reusable components
- lib/data/ with models and repositories
- Set up Firebase configuration files
- Create basic routing structure
- Add essential dependencies to pubspec.yaml

Focus on clean architecture and MVP-ready structure.

Apply AuraSync theme defaults to this new screen:

- Use Material3 design principles
- Apply clean, minimal design with blur-based overlays
- Use rounded card corners and smooth transitions
- Implement proper spacing and typography using app theme
- Add floating CTAs where appropriate
- Ensure responsive design for various screen sizes
- Include proper AppBar styling with custom_app_bar widget

Inject Apple-inspired UI patterns into this Flutter widget:

- Add smooth, natural animations and micro-interactions
- Implement iOS-style blur effects and translucency
- Use subtle shadows and depth
- Apply proper haptic feedback where appropriate
- Ensure gesture-based interactions feel natural
- Add proper accessibility support
- Use system fonts and native-feeling spacing

Validate and add authentication guards to new routes:

- Check if route requires event join status
- Implement proper navigation guards for protected screens
- Add anonymous auth validation where needed
- Ensure proper redirect logic for unauthenticated users
- Validate QR/PIN access for event-specific routes
- Add proper error handling for auth failures
- Implement deep linking protection

Optimize newly imported assets for blur background usage:

- Generate blur variants of images for background use
- Optimize image sizes for mobile performance
- Create responsive image variants (1x, 2x, 3x)
- Add proper image caching configuration
- Ensure images work well with overlay content
- Generate placeholder blur hashes for loading states
- Update asset references in pubspec.yaml
- Add proper image compression for cloud storage
